6.title: The Star Stone

 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: The Tornado
7.plot: A storm is approaching rapidly and the geese must interrupt their migration to take shelter. However, all the natural shelters were destroyed in the last storm. Only the ruins of a cabin are left. So, should they continue their flight or try to rebuild the cabin?

8.title: The Leader's Wings
8.plot: Thanks to a misunderstanding, a little manipulated by Nils, Gorgo gives his position as second in command to... Martin. At first, Nils finds this great. He can ask Martin for anything he wants because it is now he who gives the orders.

9.title: The Challenge
9.plot: In order to recover a piece of magic crystal, the Black Elf challenges the geese to a race. Martin will be their champion but without Nils as Akka has punished him for flying through a thunderstorm. Martin is losing to Krobak as the Black Elf cheats to make his champion win and Nils tries everything to make Akka change her mind...

10.title: Big Fat Gorgo
10.plot: Following a remark by Nils, Gorgo is worried about his 'special' physique. Has he discovered that he is not a goose? No, he just thinks he is too fat compared to the rest of the flock. Still sure that he is a goose but now full of complexes, the eagle loses his self-confidence.

11.title: Too Small
11.plot: Because of Nils, Martin and Pretty Wing freeze their wings and find themselves stuck in a crevasse. Nils feels too small to help them but, thanks to Akka, he will discover that his size does not matter and that his human knowledge can be very useful.

12.title: Two of a Kind
12.plot: Nils persuades Martin to impress Soft Feather by doing an aerobatics demonstration. Unfortunately, Soft Feather and the rest of the flock are not impressed by Martin but more by Nils. Martin is angry, he did the aerobatics, Nils just told him what to do.

13.title: The Gingerbread House
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: The Hero
14.plot: Nils, helped by Martin, saves Akka from a great danger. Nils, unintentionally, gets all the praise for this and Martin becomes jealous. Wanting to be treated as a hero too, the gander leaves the flock, looking for an exploit to perform - whatever the danger... Can Nils open his eyes and find him in time?

15.title: Dizzy Dive
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: The Stowaway Stork
16.plot: Nils, on Gorgo's back, manages to fly behind a waterfall. Excited by the exploit, they fly and see a group of migrating storks in the distance. Unfortunately, spotting the eagle, a young stork is scared and falls. Our heroes feel responsible for this; they dive and catch her. Now they must use cunning to hide the little stork from Akka and find some incredible ruses to return her to her family.

17.title: A Helping Paw
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Martin's Nightmare
18.plot: Martin has a nightmare but it is so real that he is sure something bad is going to happen to the flock. Nils thinks that this is just a result of Martin's none too brave nature and decides not to tell the others about the dream. However, everything happens exactly as in Martin's nightmare and our heroes find themselves in a very dangerous situation, shut in a barn with a totally crazy dog...

19.title: Double Personality
19.plot: The Black Elf has stolen Roxor the elf's glove which allows him to control lightning. Lina asks Nils to help her recover the precious object. However, when they arrive at the Black Elf's lair, the villain has accidentally directed the lightning at himself and has now split into two distinct persons. They must quickly find a solution to merge the two Black Elves back into one person again.

20.title: A Child's Play
20.plot: Nils and Martin are used as targets by Lars, a little devil of a 10 year-old boy who fires at them with his slingshot. The horrible child wants to use them to attract the whole flock in order to take their feathers - something that Nils too would have liked too before he was shrunk. However, Nils has totally changed and now wants to protect his new friends from this 'evil double'...

21.title: The Ice Garden
21.plot: The flock of geese is flying over a glacial region, looking for food, when they find themselves in the middle of erupting geysers. Gorgo, Nils and Martin are separated from the rest of the group and discover a patch of green land covered in fruit and vegetables. Nils comes up with a scheme for slipping between the geysers but it does not work exactly as planned...

22.title: The Propeller
22.plot: Wham! Nils knocks an abandoned bees nest off a tree with his propeller. He tries to find the propeller afterwards but cannot. The reason for this is that Krobak has stolen it for his master who needs the propeller to knock down the Gem of Destiny.

23.title: Some Like it Smokey
23.plot: As they are on their way to join the flock again, Nils and Martin are caught by a group of warlike crows who have come to join the Black Elf.

24.title: An Eye for an Eye... A Beak for a Beak
24.plot: Smirre attacks the geese once again and once again, our heroes just manage to escape but not after a bit more adventure...

25.title: Dear Burden
25.plot: Athanor takes Lina on a mission to the heart of the Black Elf's lair. Martin and Nils arrive but Athanor does not want the two unpredictable heroes to take part. Will they be able to successfully complete the mission?

26.title: Solo Flight
26.plot: Nils is frustrated in his desire to do aerobatics by Martin's fears and Akka's warnings. He is fuming with impatience when he sees A LITTLE FLYING SQUIRREL gliding from branch to branch. Nils thinks that if he could fly alone, he would no longer need Martin and the geese. The boy sets off to follow the squirrel. Unfortunately, the wind soon proves to be a danger leaving Nils in trouble...

27.title: The Wolverine
27.plot: There are monsters around here!... Nils discovers that the monster is, in fact, Giulio a harmless and toothless old wolverine. However, the animal has a bad reputation and Akka categorically refuses to have this fearsome predator in the camp. But Nils refuses to listen, he trusts his new friend - who helps him to save Pretty Wing and Golden Eye from a she-wolf.

28.title: Sola's Light
28.plot: Nils is charmed by Sola, Lina's cousin, a timid young elf whose power over light comes from a magical object that the Black Elf would very much like to get his hands on. As she flees from the villain, Sola loses her light-wand and her strength. Nils promises to find it before the Black Elf but he will have to show perseverance, something he tends to abandon when the going gets tough.

29.title: Big and Strong Like Gorgo
29.plot: Gorgo does not see a tree and flies straight into it, losing his memory in the accident. This is a catastrophe for the geese but a miracle for Nils who finally has the chance to explain to Gorgo that he is not a goose but a powerful, majestic eagle...

30.title: One More Mile
30.plot: Nils reproaches Akka again for her 'teacherish' attitude when the flock is fired on by hunters and must do an emergency landing in a forest to continue on foot. Akka knows there is a way out not far away... a short flight but a long way on foot. With the hunters still around, the flock has no choice but to walk...

31.title: Out of Blue
31.plot: The flock welcomes Tristan, a domestic gander who saves them from a she-wolf. His intentions may be good but Tristan soon shows himself to be totally reckless and soon unwittingly leads the flock to Smirre the fox who challenges the gander to a duel. However, there is no question of sending Tristan against the fox, they need someone experienced who knows Smirre. Who will the gang choose...

32.title: Look Before You Leap
32.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

33.title: Squeek
33.plot: Nils and Gorgo, on guard duty, find a bag full of biscuits but a lemming appears and steals it.

34.title: Not Guilty
34.plot: Martin has unfairly accused Golden Eye of stealing his hat, then he accuses Nils of eating all the berries they collected together. Nils and Golden Eye decide to play a trick on the gander with a fake lucky charm to show him what it is like to be unfairly accused...

35.title: The Exile
35.plot: Nils dreams of going to see a solar eclipse and, so that the flock will take off to watch it, he lures Smirre the fox into their camp. The plan goes wrong and Nils finds himself expelled from the flock for having put the geese in danger. Nils has problems in the countryside where everything seems enormous, that is until he meets a squirrel...

36.title: Lost
36.plot: The geese, after a long flight, come up against a thunderstorm. Their leader, Akka, exhausted by her age and the events, nearly leads them into a cliff face. She manages to pull out in time but, her confidence destroyed, now announces that she is going to retire as the geese have enough experience to migrate without her.

37.title: Treasure Hunt
37.plot: While the flock is taking a break on a Scandinavian island, Nils discovers a map in a bottle which shows the hiding place of Ulrik the Green's treasure. As Martin is busy fishing, Nils persuades Gorgo to go with him. they discover the treasure at the bottom of a well. A final trap starts to close on Gorgo and Nils begs him to drop the treasure - his friend's life is much more important.

38.title: The Exam
38.plot: Akka decides to make Nils, Martin and Gorgo take an exam on general (goose) knowledge. If they pass, they will be full members of the flock. To show them how it is done, Akka again takes the exam that she so brilliantly passed in her youth. She teams up with Martin while Nils is saddled with Gorgo as a team-mate. While Akka stresses out Martin, Nils motivates Gorgo and they start to take the lead...

39.title: The Promise
39.plot: Nils has promised to take a beaver to an island where he can live safely. However, the beaver is a 'know-it-all' and quickly infuriates the rest of the flock. The geese go on migration strike until the beaver leaves but Nils is determined to keep his promise...

40.title: Ask the Pebble
40.plot: While they are searching for food for the flock, Nils and Gorgo discover a hidden store of food and wonder whether they should take it or not. In order to decide, Nils flips a pebble and chance decides that they can take the food. Will this end well for the gang...

41.title: The Werebat
41.plot: Gorgo and Akka - isolated far from the flock - witness an aurora borealis which scares Gorgo. Akka tells him that during this phenomenon, transformations can happen. Then, unseen by Gorgo, the old goose falls headfirst into a crevasse. Gorgo finds himself alone with a bat who was passing by and is sure that it is Akka, now transformed into a 'Werebat'.

42.title: A Strange Night Owl
42.plot: The flock is trying to have a well-deserved rest when they are kept awake by a partying bat called Reggie. He is a strange night-owl who spends his time partying here and there, boasting about his previous parties, relaxing when everyone else is working and eating at every table. Nils is fascinated by Reggie's cheek and personality and insists that he travel with the group.

43.title: Paradise for Nearly All
43.plot: Our heroes have landed on an island paradise where Soft Feather and her sisters talk of nothing but handsome ganders....

44.title: Hanted Forest
44.plot: The wild geese are flying quickly, fleeing a thunderstorm, when Nils spots a small forest, an ideal place to rest. Akka refuses, saying the Big Bogeybeast, an evil spirit, lives in that forest and makes every bird disappear on the night of the full moon - and it is full moon tonight...

45.title: Fear of Heights
45.plot: As the flock flies over the territory of Hawkeye, an eagle feared throughout the region, Nils is having a great time doing aerobatics with Martin. But the last stunt does not go well and Nils has a terrible fall which is only broken by some trees as he drops through them. Will Nils be okay?

46.title: Party Animals
46.plot: The elves are about to hold their annual celebration, a very important occasion where only elves are allowed. One elf is excluded, the Black Elf, and it is vital that he does not know where the ceremony is to take place...

47.title: Home Sweet Home
47.plot: The North American Whitetail team heads for Home-Sweet-Home in pursuit of whitetail bucks on familiar ground, Stan Potts debates which archery release is best for you, and Dr. James Kroll and Pat Hogan plant cool-season food plots on this year's deer factory.

48.title: The Cosy Nest
48.plot: As the geese are relaxing in a charming place that Akka found for them, Nils goes into the forest to find a stick to make a fishing rod. He spots the right kind of stick in a tree and throws his propeller to knock it down. Unfortunately, the propeller ricochets and hits the branch of another tree, home of Skana, a psycho-rigid bat. Skana dislikes humans whom she finds to be destructive...

49.title: Much Cackling About Nothing
49.plot: It is the mating season. Pretty Wing and Golden Eye only have eyes for ganders and forget about their chores with the flock...

50.title: A Matter of Taste
50.plot: As they are flying, the geese hear a call for help. They land in a field, ready to help when they discover that the call came from none other than... Krobak, the Black Elf's henchman. What will the gang do?

51.title: The Boy Who Cried Crow
51.plot: During a flight in snowy country, Nils is getting very hungry. Gorgo offers to share some tasty worms. Everyone finds this very appetizing but Nils is almost ill just looking at them. He wants some real food, like he used to eat at home.

52.title: Both Feet on the Ground
52.plot: That's it... here we are, LAPLAND!
